org.magnos.asset.source
Class SmartSource

java.lang.Object
  org.magnos.asset.base.BaseAssetSource
      org.magnos.asset.source.SmartSource
All Implemented Interfaces:
AssetSource
public class SmartSource
extends BaseAssetSource

A source that uses regular expressions to examine the request to determine another source to use.

Author:
Philip Diffenderfer

Nested Class Summary
 class SmartSource.PatternedSource
          A simple class holding a regular expression pattern, the accompanying AssetSource, and the group in the pattern to use to determine the true request for the source.

Constructor Detail

SmartSource

public SmartSource()
Instantiates a new SmartSource with the default patterns (file, web) and default source of class-path.

SmartSource

public SmartSource(boolean loadDefaults)
Instantiates a new SmartSource.

Parameters:
loadDefaults - If true this will load the default patterns(file, web) and default source of class-path.
Method Detail

getStream

public InputStream getStream(String request)
                      throws Exception
Description copied from interface: AssetSource
Returns an InputStream to the requested asset. If the asset doesn't exist in this source then an exception will be thrown or null will be returned depending on the implementation.

Parameters:
request - The request for the asset.
Returns:
The reference to InputStream containing the requested asset, or null if the request was invalid.
Throws:
Exception - An error occurred retrieving the asset from the source.

getMatchingSource

public SmartSource.PatternedSource getMatchingSource(String request)
Returns a matching source based on the request.

Parameters:
request - The request to find a matching source for.
Returns:
The matching source, or null if non matched the request.

add

public void add(AssetSource source,
                Pattern pattern,
                int patternGroup)
Adds a new patterned source. The new source added will have highest priority and will be checked first.

Parameters:
source - The AssetSource to add.
pattern - The pattern used to match the request to a source and with the patternGroup return the true request to be passed to source.
patternGroup - The group in the regular expression that represents the true request to be passed to source.

getDefaultSource

public AssetSource getDefaultSource()
Get the default AssetSource.

Returns:
The reference to the default AssetSource or null if there is none.

setDefaultSource

public void setDefaultSource(AssetSource defaultSource)
Set the default AssetSource.

Parameters:
defaultSource - The new default AssetSource.

getSources

public ArrayList<SmartSource.PatternedSource> getSources()
Get the list of patterned sources already added to this SmartSource.

Returns:
The reference to the internal ArrayList of PatternedSources.
